name: 趙莊敏
objective:
對務管理知識作概括性之介紹，並進行財務管理的個案討論。本學期主題包括
1. 財務報表介紹，2. 時間價值，儥券及股票，3. 投資決策與折現分析
4. 風險報酬與資金成本，5. 財務論文選讀，6. 財務管理個案討論
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Finance and the Financial Manager
3. Agency Problem
4. Time Value of Money
5. Valuing Bonds
6. Valuing Stocks
7-9 Minicase Discussions
10. NPV and Other Investment Criteria
11. Making Investment Decisions with the NPV Rules
12. Risk, Return, and Opportunity cost of Capital
13. Capital Budgeting and Risk
14~18. Journal Paper discussions
scorePolicy:
minicase 20%
期中報告 40%
期末報告 40%
materials: Brealey, Myers, and Allen, ”Principles of Corporate Finance”, 10th ed., 華泰文化事業公司代理。
